sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const TeamStats = (data) => { const instance = data.props; console.log(instance); const fgp = (fgm, fga) => { return Math.round((fgm / fga) * 100) + '%'; } const tpp = (tpm, tpa) => { return Math.round((tpm / tpa) * 100) +'%'; } const ftp = (ftm, fta) => { return Math.round((ftm / fta) * 100) + '%'; } const url = 'https://ak-static.cms.nba.com/wp-content/uploads/headshots/nba/latest/260x190/' const mapPlayer = instance.map((index)=> {index.num} {index.fn[0]}.{index.ln} {index.pos ? index.pos : 'N/A'} {index.min}:{index.sec} {index.pts} {index.ast} {index.pip} {fgp(index.fgm, index.fga)} {tpp(index.tpm, index.tpa)} {ftp(index.ftm, index.fta)} {index.fbptsm}/{index.fbptsa} {index.reb} {index.stl} {index.blk} {index.tov} {index.f ? index.f : 0} {index.tf ? index.tf : 0} {index.pm ? index.pm : 'N/A'} ) return (
{mapPlayer}
# Name POS MIN PTS AST PIP FG% TP% FT% FBPTSM/FBPTSA REB STL BLK TOV F TF +/-
); } export default TeamStats;
